bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with wen yi 瘟疫 , warmth epidemic. Not documented in ancient medical literature. Possibly a writing error by LSZ. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bing ren yi 病人衣：天行疫瘟。取初病人衣服，於甑上蒸過，則一家不染 , “For heaven-sent epidemic warmth illness : Take the garments of the first patient andplace them on a steamer to have them steam. This will protect the entire household from being affected”.
